channel.title: --- Quests information ---
channel.description:
Im going to be gathering quest information soon, thought i might share with the community, what I've gathered...
I have 20 quests completed so far, and plan to do more.
1)Black knights fortress (complete) 2)cooks assistant (complete) 3)demon slayer (complete) 4)dorics quest (complete) 5)ernest the chicken quest (complete) 6)pirates treasure (complete) 7)Prince Ali rescue (complete) 8)Restless ghost (complete) 9)rune mysteries (complete) 10)shield of arrav(black arm gang ---complete) 11)shield of arrav(phoenix gang---- complete) 12)tutorial island (complete) 13)vampire slayer (complete) 14)witches house ---members (complete) 15)goblin diplomacy (complete) 16)Romeo and Juliet (complete) 17)Sheep shearer (complete) 18)Imp Catcher (complete) 19)knights sword (complete) 20)Witches potion (complete) 21)monks friend (missing 1 option) 22)fishing contest (missing 2 options) -------------------------------------------------------
i will be updating this as i continue to do them :)

item.title: --- Quests information ---
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

stEps:

i didn’t download you thing, but is this just how the quest works from beginning to the end? Doesn’t runescape classic wikia do that or no?

Its all the npc chat and playerchat for the quests that you would need in order to start coding the quests… its not a wiki guide.

Read full topic
